cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on July 14, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 473, Trusted Traveler Reconsideration and Restoration Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 14 (Monday, January 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KATKO:
H.R. 473.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 and Clause 3 of the United
States Constitution: The Congress shall have Power To lay and
collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts
and provide for the common Defence and general Welfare of the
United States; but all Duties, Imposts and Excises shall be
uniform throughout the United States
[Page H233]

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 637.

title: Trusted Traveler Reconsideration and Restoration Act of 2021
